select #{cityname} city, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '3' then count end), 0) three, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '4' then count end), 0) four, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '5' then count end), 0) five, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '6' then count end), 0) six, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '7' then count end), 0) seven, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '8' then count end), 0) eight, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '9' then count end), 0) nine, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '10' then count end), 0) ten, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '11' then count end), 0) eleven, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '12' then count end), 0) twelve, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '1' then count end), 0) one, nvl(sum(CASE WHEN month = '2' then count end), 0) two, nvl(sum(count), 0) allcount
from ( select month, count(STARTCITY) count from DEPARTDETAIL where STARTCITY = #{cityname} and CARTYPE = #{cartype} and year = #{year} group by month order by month )
select distinct STARTCITY as key, STARTCITY as value from DEPARTDETAIL where STARTCITY is not null and STARTCITY is not null
select distinct ENDCITY as key, ENDCITY as value from DEPARTDETAIL where ENDCITY is not null and ENDCITY is not null
select distinct month as key, month as value from DEPARTDETAIL where month is not null and month is not null order by MONTH
select distinct CARTYPE as key, CARTYPE as value from DEPARTDETAIL
select cartype, listagg(distinct MONTH, ',') within group ( order by MONTH) month from DEPARTDETAIL where ISMONTHCOUNT = 1 group by cartype order by CARTYPE

select CARTYPE, listagg(runcount, ',') within group ( order by MONTH) runcount from (select cartype, month, month || '月份发车次数' || count(SHEETID) || '次' runcount from DEPARTDETAIL where ISMONTHCOUNT = 1 group by cartype, month order by CARTYPE, MONTH ) group by CARTYPE

select cartype, listagg(err, ',') within group ( order by month) tmp from ( select CARTYPE, MONTH, MONTH || '月份,序号为' || SHEETID err from DEPARTDETAIL where CARNUM is null or STARTCITY is null or ENDCITY is null or STARTKILO is null or ENDKILO is null order by CARTYPE, MONTH ) a group by CARTYPE
select distinct YEAR as key, YEAR as value from DEPARTDETAIL where YEAR is not null order by YEAR
